attributes.action: Ban all gambling advertising on television.
attributes.additional_details: Consider the misery and poor mental health of gambling addicts and their families.
attributes.background: Debate this issue to help reduce the ever growing list of unfortunate gambling addicts.

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petitions:

Ban gambling advertisements on television and radio.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/548310

Ban the advertisement of gambling websites and apps
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/557212
